title: Landing hero logo refresh + podcast submission and admin review UI

requirements.summary: Update only the public landing-page hero logo to use the new uploaded logo asset while leaving the global header/nav logo unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page hero logo uses the new uploaded logo asset.
Header/navbar logo remains unchanged across the rest of the site.
No broken image links in production build.

file_operations.description: Add the resized/converted uploaded homepage hero logo asset per imageRequirements edit (Picsart_26-01-29_16-52-47-900.png -> itmp-home-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png).

Replace the hero-section source to reference frontend/public/assets/generated/itmp-home-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png, ensuring only the landing hero changes and no other logos (e.g., Header) are modified.

requirements.summary: Add a 'Submit Your Podcast' area in the user dashboard to create shows, view created shows, and add multiple episodes with required metadata and file uploads.
acceptanceCriteria: User Dashboard contains a clearly labeled section/tab for podcast submission.
Show creation form contains: title, podcast type (audio/video), description, category, language.
After creating a show, user can add episodes to that show using a separate episode form with all required fields and file uploads.
User can see a list of their shows and navigate/select a show to add episodes.
All user-facing text for these new UI elements is in English.

file_operations.description: Add React Query hooks for podcast user flows using existing backend capabilities: createPodcastShow, createPodcastEpisode, and fetching the caller’s shows/episodes (e.g., getPodcastEpisodesByUser, getPodcastEpisodesByShow/getPodcastShowWithEpisodes). Ensure queries/mutations invalidate relevant podcast caches and show English toast/error messages. Verify the authorization component usage instructions before implementing.

Create a small helper to convert browser File/Blob to the blob-storage ExternalBlob type used by the backend interface for uploads, with optional progress wiring support. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement a show creation form UI with fields: title, podcast type (audio/video), description, category, language, and show artwork upload; submit via the new query hook. Use shadcn-ui form inputs already present in the app. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement an episode creation form UI for a selected show with fields: episode title, description, 18+ toggle, explicit toggle, promotional toggle, episode type (trailer/full/bonus), season number, episode number, artwork image upload, thumbnail image upload, and media file upload (audio/video). Convert uploads to ExternalBlob and submit via the new query hook; show upload progress where feasible. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create the 'Submit Your Podcast' dashboard section that (1) shows a list of the user’s created shows, (2) provides a show creation panel, and (3) allows selecting a show to add episodes using the dedicated episode form. Ensure all user-facing strings are English and handle backend authorization errors gracefully. Verify the authorization and blob-storage components' usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new 'Submit Your Podcast' area into the existing dashboard tabs (add a clearly labeled tab/section) and render UserPodcastSubmissionSection so it is reachable without creating a new top-level route.

requirements.summary: Add an admin-only podcasts submissions area to browse user-created podcast shows and inspect their episodes, metadata, and downloadable assets.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard includes a dedicated podcasts/podcast submissions area.
Admin can see a list of podcast shows submitted by users.
Admin can expand/open a show to view its episodes and metadata.
Admin can download episode assets (artwork, thumbnail, and audio/video file) from the admin UI.
Non-admin users cannot access admin podcast submissions views.

file_operations.description: Add/extend admin-focused podcast query hooks to fetch all podcast shows and related episodes/metadata using existing backend capabilities (e.g., getAllPodcasts, getAllEpisodes, getPodcastShowWithEpisodes). Ensure cache keys are distinct from user-specific queries and errors are shown in English. Verify the authorization component usage instructions before implementing.

Create an admin-only UI section to list podcast shows and inspect a selected show’s episodes and metadata; provide download buttons for artwork/thumbnail/media using the existing downloadExternalBlob utility and/or direct URLs for preview. Verify the blob-storage component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a dedicated 'Podcasts' (or 'Podcast Submissions') tab in the Admin Dashboard and render AdminPodcastSubmissions, ensuring it is separate from music submissions.

Confirm wiring preserves the existing admin-only gate (AdminDashboard only renders for admin role) so non-admin users cannot access the admin podcasts submissions views; keep behavior consistent with other admin sections.
